ListPreference.android:title: Repeat Status
ListPreference.android:summary: Specifies the status of the repeat action, whether it be repeating the playlist, the song, or no repeat.

ListPreference.android:title: Play Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Specifies how to play media in the playlist. Persisted shuffle is guaranteed to NEVER repeat a song until all songs have been played.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Play Mode Clears Queue
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not the queue of upcoming songs in the playlist should be cleared when the play mode option changes.

ListPreference.android:title: Previous Button Action
ListPreference.android:summary: The 'Smart' option will restart the current song or play the previous song depending on how much of the song has played.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Light Up Screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not the screen should light up when a song changes, only if the screen isn't already lit up.

ListPreference.android:title: Notification Visibility
ListPreference.android:summary: Determines when the notification icon should be displayed.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Open Overlay Player
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not a mini-player will overlay the current application when the notification icon is clicked.

ListPreference.android:title: Headphone Connected
ListPreference.android:summary: Determines the action that will occur when headphones/auxiliary devices are connected to the 3.5mm jack.

ListPreference.android:title: Headphone Disconnected
ListPreference.android:summary: Determines the action that will occur when headphones/auxiliary devices are disconnected from the 3.5mm jack.

ListPreference.android:title: Headset Connected
ListPreference.android:summary: Determines the action that will occur when headsets/bluetooth devices are paired and connected.

ListPreference.android:title: Headset Disconnected
ListPreference.android:summary: Determines the action that will occur when headsets/bluetooth devices are unpaired or disconnected.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Allow Headset Controls
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not a headset/bluetooth device that is paired and connected may operate the playback controls.

dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:title: Speaker Volume
dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:summary: Specifies what the media volume will be set to if headsets/headphones are disconnected. Disabled doesn't update the volume.

dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:title: Headphone Volume
dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:summary: Specifies what the media volume will be set to if headphones/auxiliary devices are connected. Disabled doesn't update the volume.

dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:title: Bluetooth Volume
dev.paddock.adp.mCubed.preferences.SeekB.android:summary: Specifies what the media volume will be set to if headsets/bluetooth devices are connected. Disabled doesn't update the volume.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Record Logs
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not error logs are automatically recorded. It is STRONGLY recommended that this remains enabled.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Resume Automatically
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Determines whether or not playback will resume after it was automatically paused for an event (phone calls, SD card mounting, exiting mCubed, etc.).
